TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MessageBuffer extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class MessageBuffer Implements IDisposable
public ref class MessageBuffer abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示儲存整個訊息以供未來取用的記憶體緩衝區。

span.span: Represents a memory buffer that stores an entire message for future consumption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體的本文只能取用或寫入一次。The body of a instance can only be consumed or written once. 如果希望取用 執行個體超過一次，您應該使用 類別，將整個 執行個體完全儲存到記憶體中。If you wish to consume a instance more than once, you should use the class to completely store an entire instance into memory. 呼叫 執行個體的 ，即可建構 執行個體。A instance is constructed by calling of a instance. 然後，系統會建立並傳回新的 ，它會取得 的擁有權，並且將整個內容讀取至記憶體中。A new is then created and returned, which assumes ownership of the and reads the entire content into memory. 為了從 擷取 的複本，您必須呼叫 的 方法。In order to retrieve a copy of a from the , you must call the method of the . 這個方法會傳回所提供之原始 執行個體的相同複本。This returns an identical copy of the original instance you provided. 您可以將 設定為所需的位元組數目上限，藉此控制緩衝區的大小上限。You can control the maximum size of the buffer by setting to the maximum number of bytes desired. 這個數目未必涵蓋與建置緩衝區或附加至訊息之屬性有關的任何暫時性配置，This number does not necessarily cover any transient allocations related to building the buffer, or properties attached to the message. 使用完畢後，您都要呼叫 以關閉 執行個體。You should always close a instance by calling when finished working with it. 這樣可能會更快地釋放系統資源。This allows system resources to potentially be freed sooner. 給衍生自此類別之 Managed C++ 使用者的特別說明：Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class: - 請將您的清除程式碼置於 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort)，而不是解構函式。Put your cleanup code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor. - 避免使用解構函式：它們會導致編譯器自動產生 Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用非參考成員：它們會導致編譯器自動產生 Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate - 避免使用完成項；但是假如您加入一個完成項，就應該抑制建置警告並呼叫來自 (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) 的 和完成項，以模擬原本可能自動產生的 行為。Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) in order to emulate what would have been the auto-generated behavior.

summary.span: 取得這個 取用的大約位元組數目。

span.span: Gets the approximate number of bytes consumed by this .

value.span: 這個 取用的大約位元組數目。

span.span: The approximate number of bytes consumed by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將 設定為所需的位元組數目上限，藉此控制緩衝區的大小上限。You can control the maximum size of the buffer by setting to the maximum number of bytes desired. 這個數目未必涵蓋與建置緩衝區或附加至訊息之屬性有關的任何暫時性配置，This number does not necessarily cover any transient allocations related to building the buffer, or properties attached to the message. 而且序列化時與訊息實際大小無關。It is not related to the actual size of the message when serialized.

span.span: Finishes working with the buffer.

Public MustOverride Function CreateMessage () As Message

span.span: Returns a copy of the original message.

returns.span: 先前提供給 執行個體 方法之原始 執行個體的相同複本。

span.span: An identical copy of the original instance you previously provided to the method of a instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法會建立先前提供給 執行個體 方法之原始 執行個體的相同複本。Calling this method creates an identical copy of the original instance you previously provided to the method of a instance. 然後，您可以將訊息儲存至永久性儲存裝置。You can then save the message to a durable storage.

summary.span: 建立新的 物件，以便巡覽這個物件。

span.span: Creates a new object for navigating this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您只要操作部分訊息複本，請使用這個方法。Use this method if you want to manipulate just a portion of the message copy.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.IDisposable.Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
This method cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您完成使用 後，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when you are finished using the . 這個方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。This method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫這個方法後，您必須釋放 的所有參考，讓記憶體回收行程可以回收 所佔用的記憶體。After calling this method, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫這個方法。Always call this method before you release your last reference to the . 否則，在記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法之前，不會釋放它正在使用的資源。Otherwise, the resources it is using are not freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteMessage(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed

param.name: stream
param.span: 在其中寫入這個緩衝區整個內容的 IO 資料流。

span.span: An IO stream that the entire content of this buffer is written to.

summary.span: 將這個緩衝區的整個內容寫入指定的 IO 資料流。

span.span: Writes the entire content of this buffer to the specified IO stream.
